biography: Kristian, a familiar face from Master Golf Club, brings a certain intensity to the greens. Though possessing a calm exterior, those who have played alongside him speak of a fierce competitor who never relents.

Kristian has participated in the Hector Trophée on three occasions, each time bringing his characteristic determination to the competition. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have thus far eluded him, his consistent presence is a testament to his passion for the sport.
Though not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, the world of golf knows well that fortunes can change swiftly, and anticipation remains high for Kristian's next appearance.
